long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Visually manage your Tabs.


functionalities:
 - rearrange your browser space easily by dragging and dropping from the vertical list of tabs
 - Tabs: Pin, Bring forward, Close
 - Right click anywhere in a page for Context Menu: Allows for management of workspaces  (this will be paired with grouped tabs soon...) 

Default Shortcuts:
     - Copy all open urls of the current window: 
           > Mac: Cmd + SHIFT + Y
           > Others: CTRL + SHIFT + Y

     -  Open copied Urls in a browser:
           > Mac: ALT + SHIFT + Y
           > Others: ALT + SHIFT + Y

 paste them anywhere as you naturally do :) 
    - cmd + V 
    - ctrl + V
 

Visit - chrome://extensions/shortcuts if your system doesn't set those by default :)
